DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of the study is to determine the safety and tolerability of AZD1446 vs Placebo given as an add-on treatment to Donepezil for 4 weeks in patients with mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease.
DOC.brief_title: 4 Week, Safety and Tolerability Study in Patients With Mild to Moderate Alzheimer's Disease
DOC.criteria: history of progressive worsening of memory and other cognitive functions for at least 12 months treatment with stable dose of donepezil (10 mg) for at least 3 months the patient should have an appropriate caregiver, who is required for all study visits history of allergy/hypersensitivity reactions significant neurological disease or dementia other than Alzheimer's disease myocardial infarction or acute coronary syndrome within the last year
DOC.keyword: To determine the safety and tolerability of AZD1446 vs Placebo given as an add-on treatment to Donepezil in patients with mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease
